mapper.select: SELECT cg.cg_num, cg.mbr_id, cg.cg_name, cg.cg_picture, cg.cg_content, cg.cg_start_date, cg.cg_end_date, cg.cg_current_mbr_count, cg.cg_max_mbr_count, stl.ctl_level, ct.ct_num, ct.ct_name, cs.cs_status FROM challenge_group cg INNER JOIN challenge_topic_level stl USING(ctl_num) INNER JOIN challenge_status cs USING(cs_num) INNER JOIN challenge_topic ct USING(ct_num) ORDER BY cg_start_date DESC LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT cg_num, ctl_num, cg_leader_name, cg_name, cg_picture, cg_content, cg_creation_date, cg_current_mbr_count, cg_max_mbr_count, cg_start_date, cg_end_date, cg_like, cs_num, mbr_id, cs_reward_check FROM challenge_group
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge_group( cg_num AS challengeCode, ctl_num AS challengeTopicLevelCode, cg_leader_name AS challengeLeaderName, cg_name AS challengeName, cg_picture AS challengePicture, cg_content AS challengeContent, cg_creation_date AS challengeCreationDate, cg_current_mbr_count AS challengeCurrentMember, cg_max_mbr_count AS challengeMaxMember, cg_start_date AS challengeStartDate, cg_end_date AS challengeEndDate, cg_like AS challengeGroupLike, cs_num AS challengeStatusCode, mbr_id AS memberId, cs_reward_check AS challengeRewardCheck ) VALUES ( #{ChallengeCode}, #{challengeTopicLevelCode}, #{challengeLeaderName}, #{challengeName}, #{challengePicture}, #{challengeContent}, CURDATE(), #{challengeCurrentMember}, #{challengeMaxMember}, #{challengeStartDate}, #{challengeEndDate}, #{challengeGroupLike}, #{challengeStatusCode}, #{memberId}, #{challengeRewardCheck} )
mapper.select: SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(ct_num, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED) AS challengeTopicCode, ct_name AS challengeTopicName FROM challenge_topic
SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(ctl_num, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED) AS challengeLevelCode, ctl_content AS challengeLevelContent FROM challenge_topic_level
/* 챌린지 리스트 총 갯수 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM challenge_group

SELECT cg.cg_num, cg.cg_name, cg.cg_picture, m.mbr_image, cg.mbr_id, ct.ct_name, cg.cg_start_date, cg.cg_end_date, ctl.ctl_level, ctl.ctl_content, cg.cg_current_mbr_count, cg.cg_max_mbr_count, cg.cg_content FROM challenge_group cg INNER JOIN `member` m USING(mbr_id) INNER JOIN challenge_topic_level ctl USING(ctl_num) INNER JOIN challenge_topic ct USING(ct_num) WHERE cg_num = #{challengeCode};
